page.title: 07THE MIGHTY SHIRES (CONT)
page.content:
Some of the horses are named as follows; Victorwood, Modern Lass, Ruskington Elaine, Ruskington Jewel , Angela, Diamond Eva, Fair Lady, Black Bess, Heighington Fair Lady, Videt, Ruskington Jem, Darling, Kathy, Dolly, Ruskington Harold, Anna and Holly. Anna and Holly are soon to be exported to America.
By Andrew Phillips - age 10 Postscript:-The"Sleaford Standard" reported on the 19th July 1985 that Mr Ted Phillips of Ruskington Fen sold Ruskington Harvester to a New Zealand dealer. This colt will be the first "shire" to tread on the soil of New Zealand since the second world war. His horses, sold in Britain, continue to win championships all over the country.
